website_summaries.verdict: The best pair of bike inner tubes to keep on hand while out on the trails in case of emergency.
pros: Durable inner tube construction provides basic wear-and-tear resistance for longer use
Easy to stretch over a bike rim during emergency flat repairs while on a ride
cons: Bike tubes are more prone to flats than other options

customer_reviews.title: Surprised Hole in new tube
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this new tube to replace a slow leaking tube on my bicycle. Since it was Dec around the holidays, who would rush to change out the inner tube. I finally got to it last weekend, about 6-7 weeks after I received the new one and after filling with air, the tube would not hold the air. I thought maybe a loose stem. Nope, it is a hole in the new inner tube. This is where, sometimes you are better buying it from a local retailer, because it is easier to go and return it for another one. Not Happy
customer_reviews.author: L. Fine

customer_reviews.title: Works great but expensive for rubber
customer_reviews.text: This worked great but is expensive for rubber. When I was a kid, bike tubes were bike tubes, we did not have Lance Armstrong and the other famous bikers boosting what used to be plain Jane products that all of us grew up with. Now because of the prestige the famous bikers brought to the sport, simple bike consumables like bike tubes costs have gone sky rocket high. Yes the quality of rubber matters like they do for cars tires. But these are tubes, how much science does a casual biker like me need to ride? Most of us are casual bikers if that. Most bikes collect dust in the garage. So why so much for rubber tubes?
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Rode: 1100 miles to date, on my 1000W 48V 13A BATTERY  ECOTRIC SEAGULL E-BIKE
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand all the complaints on some of the reviews:These tubes worked perfectly for me! I replaced the tubes on my front E-BIKE tire in less than 10 min: Easy Peasy! No fuss! Great value for the money! I rode for about 30 miles with no problems at all! I recommend these tubes to anyone. Just be gentle with them during installation! Five Stars👍
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Low quality. Cannot hold a pressure. Blew up on 3.1 bars
customer_reviews.text: Decided to change a tube on the back wheel, because of a blowout. Tires can hold 2.5 - 4.5 bars. I'm a heavy guy, so usually pump to 3.5. This tube blew up on 3.1 bars.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I exploded the last tubes I installed because I did it wrong. I followed YouTube more closely this time and installed these babies myself with no problems! Been riding my bike for a few months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Tilby

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: First time replacing an inner tube. Made sure I bought the right size (size was on old tube), got the right type valve, who knew there's more than one...be sure to check that. Watched a You-Tube video and it was easy. Got two, since I bought the bike used and feel like other tube might need changing soon too. I'm not a bike expert or anything, but price was good, packaging was good and they arrived as expected. Also instructions helped me know to check I didn't pinch the tube and blow it up like a balloon. You-Tube videos didn't mention that could happen..
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoMom

customer_reviews.title: Wore through pretty fast, but will fix & re-use.
customer_reviews.text: I used one tire with rim tape, and it wore through extremely fast right by the air....thingy. I added a second layer of rim tape (from the un-used tire since I bought 2) and will see if that is better. I hope so! I need to repair the tire, and will continue using. This was within a month, by the way!
customer_reviews.author: KRO :)

customer_reviews.title: Used for a month on turf
customer_reviews.text: Used this for one month on grass mainly. Havent gone through trails but it installed eaisly and works great. Cant understand how some rewviewers say "the valve rips right off", they probably dont know what they are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spotty quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new set of tubes as my old ones were scheduled to be replaced. Replaced both tubes and rode the bike around the block and all seemed fine. The next morning I had a flat back tire. Turns out there was a small hole on one of the seams. Had to order a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Ressler

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: fragile stem base!!!
customer_reviews.text: The base of the stem is manufactured poorly it was like it was designed to rip apart all it needs is a dotted line. I thought is that sound of air? IT IS NO WAY! Good thing it didn't leave me stranded. I will not buy this make again. The rubber they use on the stem base is garbage. Amazon feel free to send me a replacement inner tube.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Browne

customer_reviews.title: Needed a few weeks to tell the quality
customer_reviews.text: Replaced both the front and rear tubes. Inflated both to the same PSI. 2wks later the front lost more pressure than the rear and needed to be inflated again. Thought the rear would lose air quicker. I think maybe quality of the 2 tubes are not the same. Better check pressure before every ride.
customer_reviews.author: Niki W.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to rate durability on a product just installed but so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the directions review on the inside of the box the inter tube came in installation was easy but that is because I had some bike levers which made the job much easier/faster. Hard to give an overall star rating when you have just installed and do not know if it will last a week or a year so I will have to give it 3 stars until I know.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: did the job
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say other than these tubes installed perfectly as expected. The instructions were perfectly clear, found on the inside of the box. No liner provided (thought I picked the one with a liner, but maybe not), so reused existing liners.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I inspected these with a magnification headset before installation and they appear to be high quality. They inflated evenly and have held air without leakage. I used them on 1.95" diameter vintage "Farmer John" tires on a restored 1987 Mountain Bike.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Buxton

customer_reviews.title: After a few months - flat
customer_reviews.text: I put one of these inner tubes on my mountain bike. It fit fine and it wasn't too bad to install. But after about 3 months it won't keep air in it. After 2 days it's completely flat. Poor workmanship or quality control is probably the biggest factor w/these. I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nozama in NC

customer_reviews.title: These tubes are thicker than most others
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of getting flats on my other tubes so thought I would give these a try. They are thicker, so far so good. Have used them a few times and no leaks yet. I'm hoping these will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bill

customer_reviews.title: who knew??
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through three tubes including a self sealing one to no avail . I even thought about getting a smaller tube as the valves kept shredding ,I even lost the core of the self sealing tube ...Stupid me didn't know you could get a new rim strip and that these guys offer it at no extra charge !! Wow !! problem solved ,now the tube rests on an actual rim strip and not the piece of crap that was on the rim !!! Thanks !!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Tube review
customer_reviews.text: These are great tire tubes. The price is great too. And you get 2 of them. I have installed already and they seem to do the job. I can't say how long they will last, but seem like they are made out of great materials.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar j.

customer_reviews.title: Inner tube failed after 1 month!
customer_reviews.text: I used the rim tape and the inner tube still failed after a month! I didn't run anything over, it just failed. Garbage! What a ripoff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura J

customer_reviews.title: Still Works Great After a Year
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product. I have the second one as a backup. I keep it in a bag with me on the trail. This was easy to install and a perfect fit. I think it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Old Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For An Old Bike
customer_reviews.text: I have a Trek bike that dates back to 2002 and hadn't been ridden in many many years. Thes tubes were easy to install and hold the air pressure (so far) over a period of a week.
customer_reviews.author: MrThink

customer_reviews.title: Fine initially!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the tubes but at least initially they appear quite fine. Of course you’re asked by the survey about durably, etc that cannot be addressed so early but I can say they give the appearance of being well made. Will write a f/u note later
customer_reviews.author: rsmith501

customer_reviews.title: Popped on the 2nd ride
customer_reviews.text: Used this tube on a secondary bike that is barely used, maybe twice since replacing the tube. On the 2nd ride, tube blew & air leaked out in seconds. Found 2 slits by a seam. At the seam the tube easily split apart. Rim strips were replaced at the same time. Surprised by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Renny Yu

customer_reviews.title: Good product, reliable source.
customer_reviews.text: Bicycle tire tubes, 2 pack, good product but disappointed price increase from $16.90 to $21.95 in just a few weeks since our last purchase. Will buy again tho as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: 29er Tubes purchase. I recommend buying from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: This seller answered my questions and made things 100 percent right with me. I could not ask any more from them than that. Thank you guys! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bub F

customer_reviews.title: Timely arrival and accurate description
customer_reviews.text: The tube fit my bike so the description was accurate. It’s been a week since I put this tube on my bike and have had no issues. It arrived timely. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sciarillo

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good value due to defect
customer_reviews.text: One of the two tubes had a hole in it so it is useless. The other went in fine. Hopefully it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bartelme

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: These tubes have ultra slow leaks that leave the tire flat in about a week. It seems to be an issue with the material, not the construction . In the same way water seeps out of a soaker hose, the air seeps out of the rubber. It’s very strange .
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Right product but not packed as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered wrapped in plastic wrap instead of boxes as pictured. Tubes are right ones and will do as intended. Gave 3 stars for not shipping as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy them.
customer_reviews.text: We order 4 tubes and 1 tube leak around the stem. Wanted to replace just the 1, because we didn’t want to take the other 3 off just to return all of them. Went to the hardware store and bought 1 for only 5.00 would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyd

customer_reviews.title: Street Fit 360 bike tube
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, great price, timely delivery. Bought four of these two take care of two bicycles. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scratch

customer_reviews.title: 👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Both had hat seem to be defects maybe I got a bad batch but not impressed to see both failed
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Quality product from a USA veteran owned company
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a product made here in USA and owned by an military veteran. Packaged and wrapped perfectly for shipping. No issues with delivery and installation. Pretty standard for a bicycle inner tube but I appreciate that there was a note card that gave me more information on the company.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Lacks durability
customer_reviews.text: I replaced both of the inner tubes on my bike and the very next day one of the inner tubes deflated. So upsetting. It was easy to install but lack durability.
customer_reviews.author: Annaca

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Whole procedure from removing back wheel, replacing the tube, checking for tube pinches and filling with air and reinstalling the wheel on the bike took less than 15 minutes. Expensive tubes are a waste of money. This is a good value
customer_reviews.author: michael t  kelvie

customer_reviews.title: POP!
customer_reviews.text: Pop! is not the sound you want to hear when you are adding a little air to the tire.and getting ready to go for a bike ride. lol what a hunk of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Senecal

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: So far they are working good and lasting. Pretty easy to install also
customer_reviews.author: Whiplash

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and in perfect condition ready to install.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper!

customer_reviews.title: first tube burst at seam, bummed, 2nd seems okay so far time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Bummed bought 2 to have a replacement, 1st one burst with 20psi while setting the bead on a cruiser tire. split right along the seam and sounded like shotgun. Good news the second was great and we are able to ride today. I just hate throwing good money away.
customer_reviews.author: Matthias LambertTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Tough rubber.
customer_reviews.text: Came in the mail quickly and got me back on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: fisher

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: My original inner tube lasted for 3 years so I bought this one & I hope it will last longer.Good quality product, size was perfect,easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: FAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my older mountain bike that has 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my older mountain bike that has 1.95 tires. So far no problems and it is installed on my front tire with the suspension fork. I generally ride on the street and some fire roads and have not had any issues with the tube. It often hangs in my garage for a little while and I don't have to refill it with air either.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Freese

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfortable white bicycle tubes.
customer_reviews.text: Look great on bike! Got lots of positive comments. Rides really well and comfortable. Very happy with them! Arrived on time.packaged well. Would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: MDHutton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tube and rim strips. Only one issue
customer_reviews.text: These tubes and run strips are exactly what I needed. They seem to be very high quality and a perfect fit. My only complaint was that both rim strips were in one box. That was a bit confusing. Great value though.
customer_reviews.author: Mikebib

customer_reviews.title: No problems with these inner tubes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with just a small amount of air. These tubes seem to be of quality materials. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R V

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, the tubes inflate ))
customer_reviews.text: nothing remarkable to report, they are bike tubes, a commonly replaced item... these suit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: taco9k

customer_reviews.title: ) All is good! Highly
customer_reviews.text: replaced the tubes on my 1962 Schwinn Tandem. 6 months and they are holding air perfectly still! My bike sits outside in the elements (I know shame on me... I'm waiting on the shed...) All is good! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Logan H.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Service
customer_reviews.text: Bike tube was delivered quickly and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the tube based on the good reviews. I purchased three tubes. They are good, but one of the tubes was dead on arrival. It was gashed. It's too bad that I did not inspect them until I really needed it, but now its too late to return. Anyway take out the tubes and inspect them when you get them.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dao

customer_reviews.title: Great tubes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and I basically got two for less than it would have cost to have 1 installed at the bike shop. So far, they have been of superior durability!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Handwerk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and very durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been pedaling this product around town! What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the rim specs from my bicycle and ordered this. It was a perfect match as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: G Man

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t last...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I got unlucky but I got this tube and it last one week before it was ripped. I changed the tube and the second one got ripped in one week as well... it doesn’t worthy it !!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated and holy
customer_reviews.text: One of the tires in the set had many small holes all through it.
customer_reviews.author: jaimie guzman

customer_reviews.text: The package comes with 2 tubes. Unfortunately one was defective so I had to use my 'emergency' tube instead. The other one works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Curt S.

customer_reviews.title: They hold air.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to go with my new tires and they have held air as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Explosive..
customer_reviews.text: I tried to save money and ended buying this garbage :( These BLOW UP at the drop of a hat! You will re-do your labor and regret not spending a few dollars more...
customer_reviews.author: F. Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with the wonderful customer service. My package was misplaced during shipping and they were so helpful with getting me a package delivered in a timely fashion. And for the product they’re amazing, great durability and quality. I recommend cycle dna for all your cycling needs.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Brunton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: They are very durable. The rubber seems a little thicker than cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Product is as good or better than OEM (original tube).
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping , had the bicycle on the road in less than twenty minutes , holds air and no air loss after 24hrs. Very Pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: DtL

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Brand name tubes, shipped promptly. I would recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Delmont

customer_reviews.title: Value priced MTB inner tube & rim strip.
customer_reviews.text: Well this is the less glamorous part of your tire, but pretty key. The inner tube fit well, seems well made without adding excessive weight to the wheel. Includes a rim strip to replace the crumbly one you have now.
customer_reviews.author: Hardware Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Good Value. Nice thick tubes
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Easy to put on the bike and inflate
customer_reviews.author: I’m_The_Favorite

customer_reviews.title: Thicker rubber.  Nice tube
customer_reviews.text: The rubber seems thicker than the tube the came in the Trek bike. It was well packaged and installation was just as a bike tube should be. Durability is yet to be determined
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. As desribed
customer_reviews.text: First time user happy with it so far rode on them probably 10 times now.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not Great but not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Replacements on an older bike. Not great but not bad either. Still holding air as they should.
customer_reviews.author: WRP

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement tire
customer_reviews.text: Very good replacement and if you live in the US the Schrader valve is what you want. Presta valve is jacked up and will only require you to buy more parts and probably break things out of frustration
customer_reviews.author: Kevin White

customer_reviews.title: Flat after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Daily use for commuting to school and work in an urban area. Broke after 1 month. Getting a replacement and hoping it doesn't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Work Fine in Commuter Bike
customer_reviews.text: Will be using to replace some heavy duty tubes in my commuter MTB that are just way to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hilt

customer_reviews.title: Bike inner Tube work .
customer_reviews.text: These are bike inner tubes. They both held air. They fit. I cannot get too thrilled over an inner tube, but this was a great price and no one locally had them in stock.
customer_reviews.author: T.R.P.C.

customer_reviews.title: What can you say about an inner tube?
customer_reviews.text: It's a bicycle inner tube. It doesn't leak. The fitting is threaded. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Allen

customer_reviews.title: It’s a tube. Holds air. Haven’t had to fix a flat yet, so that’s 1 for the win column!
customer_reviews.text: Good value tubes. Have held air so far, no punctures. As advertised.
customer_reviews.author: RESEARCHBEFOREBUYING

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: son installed this himself on his bike and it has been working great since very well pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Spotty Quality
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old tube that had valve stem malfunction. Installed and inflated these tubes no problem. Needed to add air to both tires the following morning, and this became a daily trend. Whatever the problem is seems to be a slow bleed, so I guess I can still at least use them while I look for better tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Bike Tubes
customer_reviews.text: Happy With My Purchase. These Bike Intertubes Are Working Great. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bruins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, made in USA. Opened the package, installed on bike, inflated and ready to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up to inflation
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pack of two tubes. Both tubes blew out while filling them. Barely hit 40psi before they went.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These suck
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst tubes on the planet. I purchased 12 tubes for multiple bikes and I've used 6 on the same bike with only street riding.
customer_reviews.author: bondkx01

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great packaged deal, tubes and rim strips all for an nice low price.
customer_reviews.author: Ron ...

customer_reviews.title: Excellent packaging to prevent any damage during shipment
customer_reviews.text: Very timely delivery. Excellent packaging to prevent any damage during shipment. Excellent product. Met expectations as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Louis M.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels on the bike go round and round. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Wheels on the bike go round and round. I hope my son gets years of pleasurable riding out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly in my bike. It was my first time changing a bike inner tube and it was easy (after googling how to do it). Just put a little air in the tube and in it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Her two-wheeler is working again.
customer_reviews.text: As is posted SO many times here on Amazon in reviews . . . happy wife . . . happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, no issues, nothing fancy either
customer_reviews.text: You gotta fiddle with it to get it in the middle but it does the job and does not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions included were very helpful & product was high quality.
customer_reviews.author: JaneAusten

customer_reviews.title: I would give these a zero if that rating was available!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand because Amazon recommended them. The inner tube lasted for 5 minutes of a 30 minute bike ride on asphalt. Someone recommended inner tubes made only in the USA. Not sure what brand that is.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick tubes
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered as promised. The tubes seem to be very durable but of course I just installed them so we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, got about 20mi out if them
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, they both popped after about 20mi. Bought a different brand and so far so good. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: Basic bicyle tire
customer_reviews.text: Basic bicycle tube. I already used one. It seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ke' Ellise

customer_reviews.title: They’re inner tubes
customer_reviews.text: Fairly fast delivery. What else can I say? They are bicycle tire inner tubes. They worked.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Estes

customer_reviews.title: Great Tubes!
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered for my husband's bike, we got them on, and they're great! Not to mention, affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they were a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet, they were a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and intact. So far works well. Hopefully this tube lasts more than a month!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dodd

customer_reviews.title: I’d order again
customer_reviews.text: I am happy withis this tube. Good product and great price. Fast delivery too. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been riding on these for a couple months and they have been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Will Wauson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and is holding up very well after a month of daily use! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: durable definitely than the slime tube crap. i really feel like i got my money worth
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie Torres

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Installation went well. As advertised. Would recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality tubes. Straight forward and seems to hold air, which is the tubes job, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: James J Stadler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked and fit as expected, bought 2 so that I have an extra
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hale

product_meta.title: Tube 26 x 1.95-2.125 Schrader Valve -with Optional Rim Strips
feature_bullets: Be sure the tire bead is seated evenly all around the rim by first adding a little air to the tire, checking the bead on both sides and if beaded properly continue filling air to the correct pressure as stated on the tire.
For the health of your tire and tube always maintain the proper air pressure. See the side of your tire for minimum and maximum pressures.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
